skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my slides
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Transform your Dropbox to a slideshow maker. Even with a free Dropbox account you can store up to 500 photos (depends on resolution).

Create self-running presentations with different image duration (10 - 90 seconds).

Create and run slideshows with loops (5 loops in total).

Change image scale between best-fill (default) and best-fit.

Stream on multiple Alexa enabled devices with screen (Echo Show, Fire Tablet, Fire TV Stick, Fire TV Stick 4k, Fire TV Cube,...).

Link unlimited Alexa enabled devices with screen to the same account to share your slideshows across your family.

Run it anywhere, just take your Alexa enabled device with you:
- business presentations;
- family gatherings;
- parties with friends;

How to create photo galleries:
- link your Dropbox account (or create new free Dropbox account) with the skill.
- go to your Dropbox > Apps > MySlides folder. This folder will be created for you by Dropbox when you linked your account with the skill.
- create sub-folders with the names of your galleries. 
- copy photos into these sub-folders.

IMPORTANT: In order to integrate your Dropbox account and the skill properly, the email address of your Dropbox account needs to be verified.
https://help.dropbox.com/accounts-billing/settings-sign-in/verify-email


Available commands:
- Alexa, open My Slides.
- Alexa, stop.
- Alexa, help.

To search for a photo gallery (Tip: for search you can use spelling: Alexa, show A B C...):
- Alexa, ask My Slides to show 'Mountain trip'.
If the skill already running:
- Alexa, show 'Mountain trip'.

To change image duration:
- Alexa, set duration 1 minute.
- Alexa, set delay 10 seconds.

To run slideshows with loops (5 loops in total):
- Alexa, loop on.
- Alexa, loop off.

To change image scale (toggle between best-fill and best-fit):
- Alexa, change scale.

Navigation commands:
- Alexa, page up.
- Alexa, page down.
- Alexa, scroll up.
- Alexa, scroll down.
- Alexa, go back.


Every moment together counts, so make the most of family time with these perfect ideas:
- run slideshows from your personal Dropbox with the 'My Slides' skill (search for 'myslides' skill in your Alexa app);
- play you own music and audiobooks from your Dropbox with the 'Sound Stream' skill (search for 'soundstream' skill in your Alexa app);
- play you own videos from your Dropbox with the 'My Video' skill (search for 'myvideo' skill in your Alexa app);
